title: How CEO Anjali Sud Made Vimeo into a Billion Dollar Company
description: Vimeo CEO Anjali Sud chats with Scott and Nora about her path from serving as head of marketing at Vimeo, to becoming CEO in 2017, and details how she transformed the company from a $40 million company, to a publicly traded company worth over $5 billion. She also reveals why she took a risk and pitched her big idea for Vimeo’s redirection, helping it become a software platform for businesses at every stage.
